_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Five qualities of a resident mendicant t: Not accomplished in being well-presented and doing their duties
Not very learned and don’t remember what they’ve learned
Not self-effacing and don’t enjoy self-effacement
Not a good speaker and don’t speak well
Accomplished in being well-presented and doing their duties
Very learned and remember what they’ve learned
A good speaker and speak well
